moves.1. e4: Hello hiredgun112 fans and followers.Here is a short annotation from me please leave input.Have a great day.He opens with e4
moves.1... e5: I answer with e5.This is a standard answer move for me.If you notice lately i have been opening with d4 if i am white.
moves.2... Bc5: Trying something a little different bring out kingside bishop instead of knight first
moves.3... Nf6: bring out my kingside cowboy,i believe iam ahead in development
moves.4... Nc6: Both of my cowwboys out now
moves.6. c4: he does have a chain here
moves.6... Nxe4: I have  good control of center
moves.7. a4: to much pawn movement no development
moves.7... Qg5: notice my bishop and queen placement
moves.8. f3: trying to scare cowboy,i ain't skeered!
moves.8... Bf2+: put on check with Bf2 cover with Ne4
moves.10. Qc2: a better move would have been f3xNe4,but would have been futile for him game is lost
moves.10... Bxh3#: Another shattered dream and broken heart!I hope you enjoyed annotation and can use it to improve your game.Please leave input
